title: How Congress is trying to end child abuse online
description:
A closer look at two bills which aim to deal with the issue of online child abuse, including the EARN IT Act, which raises major privacy concerns.

Featuring:
Assem Khaled (@Lyserberg)
Adi Robertson (@thedextriarchy)
Aaron Mackey (@aaron_d_mackey)

Links to resources discussed:
Can gaming solve its predator problem?
New bill would put $5 billion toward fighting online child abuse

The EARN IT Bill Is the Government’s Plan to Scan Every Message Online


Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
